abstract: Colorado Avalanche beat Montreal Canadiens, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
snippet: Jarome Iginla scored twice, including the go-ahead goal with 2 minutes 3 seconds remaining, and the host Colorado Avalanche beat the Montreal Canadiens, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Jarome Iginla scored twice, including the go-ahead goal with 2 minutes 3 seconds remaining, and the host Colorado Avalanche beat the Montreal Canadiens, 3-2.
